data.message:
I've not been liking the settings for "Groups" at all- I've had people I've just met add me without my consent to groups they've just created, and then your e-mail box fills with message notices and reply notices, and notices for the notices, because people start commenting on your "just joined the group" notice... so you don't even have had to have seen the group that you're dragged into, to be spam-blitzed by it...

They really need to adjust it so they can only send us an invite or a suggestion for their groups... (-_-; )
